ProjectTitle: How is transnationalism “transnationalized”? The intercultural transfer of contemporary Peruvian narratives
InitialFeedbackHistory:
19/03/2024
Data: You now only mention the source data in the table, will you also generate data, eg processed data files, code? Please also list newly generated datasets in the tabel and describe how you will manage these.
Documentation: How will you document your research progress, will you use tools such as NVivo for example? See https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/tools and https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
Preservation/Sharing: Which data will you preserve and share, will you preserve the novels, translations, films? Do you need to share these or can you refer to the source where you accessed these? Are you allowed to share these materials in a repository such as RDR or are there copyright restrictions? Is there other data that you generate that you are planning to share in RDR?
